statement.p: Averie loves gummy worms so much that after returning from Costco with some gummy worms, she eats 20 of the gummy worms she just bought. The next day she eats 20 of the remaining gummy worms and continues to eat another 20 each day. What percent of the gummy worms will Averie have left after three days? (Round your answer to the nearest whole percent.)
